CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Time__c),null, IF((MOD((Time__c/1000)/60,1)*60) > 10, TEXT(FLOOR( (Time__c/1000)/60)) + ":" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((Time__c/1000)/60,1)*60) ) + " seconds", TEXT(FLOOR( (Time__c/1000)/60)) + ":0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((Time__c/1000)/60,1)*60) ) + " seconds" ))
CustomField.label: Display Time
